 2018-03192018-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisAppointment of CHERYL MAY of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, on a part-time basis.
